subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams extended her winning streak over Maria Sharapova with a 7-5, 4-6, 6-1 victory, advancing to the Family Circle Cup semifinals in Charleston, S.C. Williams has defeated Sharapova four consecutive times since 2005 and is 5-2 over all against her. Sharapova had won her first clay-tournament title last week at Amelia Island.
